definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Arrive Niagara Falls by evening, view and take pictures at the spectacular world famous falls.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚时分抵达尼加拉瓜瀑布区参观七彩瀑布夜景。

sentences.english: A fisherman cast his net into a flooded street in Tipitapa, Nicaragua, Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 一名渔夫将渔网撒入被洪水淹没的街道，尼加拉瓜。

sentences.english: American troops stayed in Nicaragua until nineteen thirty-three.
sentences.chinese: 美国军队留在尼加拉瓜，直到一九三三年。

sentences.english: One of Canada's Internationally known icon is the Niagra Falls.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大国际有名的地标为尼加拉瓜大瀑布。

sentences.english: The Nicaraguan smoke represents the pinnacle of achievement for Oliva Cigar Co.
sentences.chinese: 尼加拉瓜烟代表奥利瓦雪茄公司的成就顶峰。

sentences.english: Costa Rica, Belize, Nicaragua, Bermuda, the Bahamas, Tobago, Sam Guan.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加伯里兹尼加拉瓜百慕大巴哈马多巴哥？

sentences.english: He has sought and been granted asylum in Nicaragua.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在尼加拉瓜寻求并已得到庇护。

sentences.english: Nicaragua occupied it last year on the basis of a Google map.
sentences.chinese: 去年尼加拉瓜在谷歌地图上将小岛占为己有。

sentences.english: Danilo Antonio LARA, Secretary of Communication, Liberal Constitutional Party, Republic of Nicaragua.
sentences.chinese: 拉雷，自由宪政党宣传部主任，尼加拉瓜。

sentences.english: Garment factories are moving from Honduras to a Nicaraguan free-trade zone.
sentences.chinese: 服装厂正从洪都拉斯搬往尼加拉瓜的自贸区。

sentences.english: Conjugal succession is also a threat in Nicaragua.
sentences.chinese: 配偶的延续执政也在尼加拉瓜形成威胁。

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
Puerto Rico, self-governing unincorporated territory of the United States

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2
